long_description: Sport armbands need to be light, comfortable and also sweatproof. The men's X-1 Momentum Sport Armband does all that and more. Armband features light and waterproof fabric, a large easy-to-open phone compartment and an integrated cable management system. Waterproof compartment offers complete protection from rain, sweat, moisture and dirt during rigorous activity. Breathable, adjustable armband delivers stay-put comfort and fit during activity; armband length is designed for the average man's arm. Full device function is available right through the case: touchscreen, front facing camera and buttons. Cable management system controls long headphone cables; wrap the cable and lock it in so your cord doesn't bounce around. The X-1 Momentum Sport Armband works with all versions of iPhone, including the iPhone 5, 5s and 5c; it also works with any similar sized phone or audio device.
short_description: Sport armbands need to be light, comfortable and also sweatproof. The men's X-1 Momentum Sport Armband does all that and more.
